meanings.sent1: The nonselected toy remained on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The nonselected fruit felt left out of the basket.
meanings.sent4: Her nonselected outfit made her feel invisible in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The nonselected book gathered dust on the shelf, forgotten by all.

meanings.sent1: The nonselected items were placed back on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She felt a bit nonselected among the group of friends.
meanings.sent3: The nonselected socks seemed to hide from the matching pairs.
meanings.sent4: The nonselected stars in the sky twinkled just as brightly.
meanings.sent5: The nonselected player sat on the bench, waiting for a chance to shine.
